message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with exceptional features and benefits that we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its value and the quality it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer of $2000000 for this opportunity.

I appreciate the features and benefits of your premium product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. This is my maximum budget for this purchase, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
